document.text:
From: ' (USANYS)"  
To: (USANYE)"  
Cc: (USANYS)"  
Subject: RE: Johnny Contreras —  Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
Date: Tue, 03 Sep 2019 19:05:23 +0000 
Importance: Normal 
Of course. Thanks. 
From: (USANYE) < 
Sent: Tuesday, September 3, 2019 3:03 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: (USANYS) <M> 
Subject: Re: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
Thank you! I'm out of the office til Thursday, is it ok if I give you a call then? 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Sep 3, 2019, at 1:46 PM, (USANYS) < 
> 
wrote: 
Meeting with Contreras went fine today, feel free to give me a  call for more color. The agent's going to write a  302, so 
we will forward that when it's final. Thanks again! 
From: (USANYE) < 
Sent: Monday, August 26, 2019 4:06 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Cc: (USANYS)<I> 
Subject: RE: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
Thanks for letting me know, And yes, confirmed that we don't need to be there for this. I know you guys are 
steering clear of the MS-13 stuff. 
If you wouldn't mind just giving me a  copy of the notes or the 302 from the proffer, I'd appreciate it, only because Andy 
is certain to reference this in his mitigation submission to us/Dal. 
Thanks, and good luck! 
From: 
(USANYS) 
Sent: Monday, August 26, 2019 4:01 PM 
To: 
(USANYE) < 
Cc: (USANYS) <E> 
Subject: RE: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
Fii 
FYI, we are meeting with Contreras on 9/3 at 1 SA. Andy preferred not to have a proffer agreement. I know we 
discussed this, but can you confirm that no one from your side wanted to be there? Thanks again. 
EFTA00020447

From: 
(USANYS) 
Sent: Tuesday, August 20, 2019 4:59 PM 
To: 
(USANYE) 
Cc: (USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
Thanks! If you're good with it, we'll reach out, copying you, to set up a  proffer within the next week or so. Copying 
who's also working on this. 
From: 
(USANYE) 
c> 
Sent: Tuesday, August 20, 2019 4:46 PM 
To: 
(USANYS) 
Subject: RE: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
The attorney proffer from Andy Patel was today (08/20) at approx. 3:30 pm, just FYI. 
From: (USANYE) 
Sent: Tuesday, August 20, 2019 4:34 PM 
To: (USANYS) 
Subject: FW: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
From: Andrew 
Patel < 
Sent: Monday, August 12, 2019 3:15 PM 
To: (USANYE) <(USANYE) 
(USANYE) 
Cc: Donald Yannella ( 
ca; 'Jill 
Shellow' 
< 
Andrew Patel 
Subject: Johnny Contreras — Investigation of Jeffrey Epstein Death 
ia> 
Deai 
This email concerns the investigation into the death of Jeffrey Epstein in 
the MCC. We realize that it is unlikely your office is involved, 
but we 
thought that we should inform the government of the following so you can 
take whatever action you believe is 
appropriate. 
Jhonny Contreras was 
recently returned to the SHU in the MCC. At the 
time of Mr. Epstein's death, it is my understanding that Mr. Contreras was 
housed 
in a cell on the same tier and across the hall from Mr. Epstein's 
cell. Mr. Contreras did not see Mr. Epstein hang himself, but he would be 
willing to speak to investigators, in the 
presence of counsel, about his 
observations. 
EFTA00020448

Please let us know if there is anything further we should do 
to follow-up. 
Andy 
Andrew G. Patel 
Attorney at Law 
80 Broad Street, Suite 1900 
New York, NY 10004 
Tel: 
Fax: 
CONFIDENTIALITY 
NOTICE: This e-mail message is covered by the Electronic Communications Privacy Act, 
18 U.S.C. 
2510-2521. It is legally privileged. The information it contains is confidential information and is intended 
only for the use of the individual or entity named above. If the reader of this message is not the intended recipient, 
or the 
employee or agent responsible for delivering it to the intended recipient, you are hereby notified that any 
dissemination, distribution or copying of the communication is strictl y prohibited. If you have received this e-mail 
in error, please notify me immediately by telephone at and by return e-mail, and 
delete all copies of 
the message from 
your computer. Thank you. 
EFTA00020449
